channel.title: Videos on Pablitar Games
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on Pablitar Games

item.title: SuperCat Chapter One Release Date
item.description: CHAPTER ONE RELEASE DATE: Oct 22nd It is finally coming! The chapter one of SuperCat is going to be released for Android and iOS on October 22nd of 2019. Cant’t wait for you people to try it :) Links: Android iOS

item.title: SuperCat Level Editor
item.description: Hey there! We’ve been working a bit in adding more variety to the levels. In order to do that, we’ve added a simple wall and a level editor that goes with it. Take a look! Soon we’ll be adding some interesting levels with walls, to spice things up a bit :)

item.title: SuperCat Giant Claw Gameplay
item.description: Hey there! Take a look at this gameplay of SuperCat! In this occasion SuperCat is put against the Giant Claw, the boss of this first entry of the game. Do you think you can beat it? Try it out for free on Android!
